org.simulationsystems.csf.sim.adapters.simengines.repastS.api

Class RepastS_SimulationAdapterAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.simulationsystems.csf.sim.adapters.simengines.repastS.api.RepastS_SimulationAdapterAPI

  • public class RepastS_SimulationAdapterAPI
extends java.lang.Object
    The Repast Simphony Adapter API context factory. This class is the entry point for RepastS simulations to use the Common Simulation Framework. Note: This API was originally intended to only be used at the RepastS simulation-level, not at the individual RepastS agent-level. However, in the current version, the individual agents do use this API directly in addition to the agent-level API (RepastS Agent API). This may change in newer versions so that agents only use instantiate the agent-level API.
    Since:
    0.1
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Jorge Calderon

      • initializeAPI

        public RepastS_SimulationRunGroupContext initializeAPI(java.lang.String csfConfigurationFileName)
                                                throws java.io.IOException
        Initializes the Common Simulation Framework on the RepastS simulation side, based on the supplied CSF configuration property file. Calls the simulation-adaptor-wide Simulation API to initialize the simulation run group. NOTE: The current version initialization is hard coded to only work with the two reference implementation simulations. The CSF configuration filename is used to switch the configuration based on the simulation. In the future, this filename will be used to read an XML configuration file from the file system so that the CSF can be used for any simulation.
        Parameters:
        csfConfigurationFileName - the framework configuration file name
        Returns:
        the repast s_ simulation run group context
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.

      • initializeSimulationRun

        public RepastS_SimulationRunContext initializeSimulationRun(repast.simphony.context.Context<java.lang.Object> nativeRepastScontextForThisRun,
                                                   RepastS_SimulationRunGroupContext repastS_SimulationRunGroupContext)
        Initializes a single CSF Repast Simphony simulation run. This method configures the (already-created in the simulation API initialization) AgentMapping objects.
        Parameters:
        nativeRepastScontextForThisRun - the native repast context for this run
        repastS_SimulationRunGroupContext - the repast s_ simulation run group context
        Returns:
        the repast s_ simulation run context
